content: अधी [अधि-इ] {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To study, learn (by heart), read; (with <ab>abl.</ab> of person) learn from; उपाध्यायादधीते <ls>Sk.</ls>; सोध्यैष्ट वेदान् <ls>Bk. 1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} (<ab>P.</ab>) ({%a%}) To remember, think of, long or care for, mind, (with regret) with <ab>gen.</ab>; रामस्य दयमानोऽसावध्येति तव लक्ष्मणः <ls>Bk. 8. 119</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">18. 38</ls>; ममैवाध्येति नृपतिस्तृप्यन्निव जलांजलेः <ls>Ki. 11. 74</ls> thinks of me only. ({%b%}) To know or learn by heart, study, learn; गच्छाधीहि गुरोर्मुखात् <ls>Mb.</ls> ({%c%}) To teach, declare. ({%d%}) To notice, observe, understand. ({%e%}) To meet with, obtain; तेन दीर्घममरत्वमध्यगुः <ls>Śi. 14. 31</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} [अध्यापयति] To teach, instruct (in); with <ab>acc.</ab> of the agent of the verb in the primitive sense; (तौ) सांगं च वेदमध्याप्य <ls>R. 15. 33</ls>; विद्यामथैनं विजयां जयां च… अध्यापिपद् गाधिसुतो यथावत् <ls>Bk. 2. 21</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">7. 34</ls>; अध्यापितस्योशनसापि नीतिं <ls>Ku. 3. 6.</ls>
